message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start.
Your turn, Alice. How about a 52.5/47.5 split in my favor? Considering inflation, this is better than you'll get next round if you reject.
The tides have turned, Bob. I'm feeling generous, so I'll offer you 450,000. Take it before inflation eats away at it further!
